name: Open the box
description:
So it's one of the game SILLYFART TEAM made for emotional game jam.

Be careful cause it's really emotional and you might cry.

Also we talk about it in our other game. If you want the context of the game to really get why it's so sad and emotional, well go play our other game (I'll put the link when the game will be done.

--

You should probably read this: https://itch.io/jam/emotionalgamejam/topic/60659/s...

Also I have a twitter and a itch account :

https://regisrquoi.itch.io/ https://twitter.com/regisRquoi

--

"When people talk about emotions, they think about sad stuff. I'll try make happy and stupid stuff and make you laugh. We'll never have enough happiness in our lives." wow I'm making some serious shits here
